thread.title: If you’ve got the money, I’ve got the carnage
thread.title_full: If you’ve got the money, I’ve got the carnage - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jon Carroll
title: If you’ve got the money, I’ve got the carnage
text: Between 2006 and 2011, a devastating drought hit Syria. Almost 75 percent of the farmers left their barren lands and went to the cities to seek some way to make money. The cities grew hugely; poverty and discontent rose.
